description: Test suite for the content router in a FastAPI application, verifying content listing, creation, and retrieval functionalities.

classes.name: _FakeContentService
classes.description: A mock service class used within test functions to simulate content service behavior without accessing a real database or backend.

methods.name: test_content_list_ok_with_pagination
methods.description: Tests that the content listing API returns the expected data with pagination parameters.

methods.name: test_content_create_returns_201
methods.description: Tests that creating new content via the API returns a successful 201 status code and correct response data.

methods.name: test_content_get_not_found
methods.description: Tests that requesting a non-existent content ID results in a 404 not found error.
